infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Allow access to the microphone to record voice transactions.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow camera access to take wallet and profile photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow access to your photos to set wallet and profile images.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Allow saving edited photos from wallet and profile image picker.
infoPlist.NSUserNotificationsUsageDescription: Allow notifications for budget alerts and updates.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow access to your photos to set wallet and profile images.
plugins.cameraPermission: Allow camera access to take wallet and profile photos.
